channel.title: Ekstrak - Livin Life [DnB, Intonations Vocal Chops]
channel.description:
Ladies and Gentlemen, after 3 months, my new song, ‘Livin Life’ is finally out! https://soundcloud.com/xtrk/livin-life ![image|500x500,100%](upload://rtWGymt0YOQCSv71Jfzl79uHhdA.jpeg) This is probably my best DnB track up to date. The vocals heard in the song came purely from the Intonations Vocal Chops Pack in Auxy.
I am, at the moment, planning on making a remix competition over this song, if you guys want to remix this. Let me know.
I do hope you enjoy! Feedback and Constructive Criticism is allowed!

item.title: Ekstrak - Livin Life [DnB, Intonations Vocal Chops]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Straight fire. Not really much bad to say about this, you’re doing great work. The drop out at 2:30 is a bit lengthy, you might want to consider a mix of this with less breaks in the flow? It’d be for sitting in a dnb/jungle mix. But as a song you’d listen to not in the context of a mix, it works well in building/releasing tension.

Anyway, awesome job, art on point. The total package imo.

Read full topic
item.source: Ekstrak - Livin Life [DnB, Intonations Vocal Chops]
